Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Veterans

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the United States Department of Homeland Security to expedite the adjustment of immigration status of immigrants serving in the United States Armed Forces and to halt deportations of immigrants who are active duty service members or who have been honorably discharged from the United States Armed Forces.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: US Dept of Homeland Security to expedite the adjustment of immigration status of immigrants serving in the US Armed Forces.

Items.Title: Resolution urging the federal government to pass legislation that will establish a pathway to citizenship for Temporary Protected Status beneficiaries.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establish a pathway to citizenship for Temporary Protected Status beneficiaries.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Veterans

Resolution calling on the United States Department of Homeland Security to expedite the adjustment of immigration status of immigrants serving in the United States Armed Forces and to halt deportations of immigrants who are active duty service members or who have been honorably discharged from the United States Armed Forces.

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Cabrera, Greenfield and Gentile
